definitions.definition: Experienced or gained by taking in another person’s experience rather than through first-hand experience, such as through watching or reading .
examples: People experience vicarious pleasures through watching television.
The concept of vicarious atonement, that one person can atone for the sins of another, is found in many religions.

secondary_definitions: Experienced or gained by taking in another person’s experience rather than through first-hand experience, such as through watching or reading .
